    cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.utils/FileCloudManager.java

    Class for managing settings for different cloud storage service providers.

    1.0

        public void loadCloudSettings()
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Load CloudSettings from default location.

      • loadCloudSettings

        public void loadCloudSettings(java.io.File path)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Loads CloudSettings from specified path. If the path parameter points to a folder, all the files in the folder are loaded.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to be loaded.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the location doesn't exist or some files are unreadable.

      • loadCloudSettings

        public void loadCloudSettings(java.lang.String path)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Loads CloudSettings from specified path. If the path parameter points to a folder, all the files in the folder are loaded.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to be loaded.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the location doesn't exist or some files are unreadable.

        Loads a single CloudSettings from file.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the file cannot be loaded.

      • loadFolder

        private void loadFolder(java.io.File path)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Loads all files in the supplied folder.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to the folder.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If one or more of the files cannot be loaded.
